amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.para: The object of the University of Nebraska shall be to afford to the inhabitants of this state the means of acquiring a thorough knowledge of the various branches of literature, science and arts.

annotation.para: Affording the means of acquiring a thorough knowledge of the various branches of literature, science and the arts is not the limit of the purposes, powers or activities of the University of Nebraska. Fisher v. Board of Regents, 108 Neb. 666, 189 N.W. 161 (1922).
